ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo

Class WorldImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo.WorldObjectImpl
      • ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo.WorldImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destroyable, Interactable, NamedObject, World, WorldObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BrainViewer, ElasticWorld

    public class WorldImpl
extends WorldObjectImpl
implements World, Interactable
    Implementation of World. World holds World Objects and has navigation and interaction handlers.

      • setBounds

        public boolean setBounds(double x,
                double y,
                double w,
                double h)
        Description copied from interface: WorldObject
        Set the bounds of this node to the given value. These bounds are stored in the local coordinate system of this node. If the width or height is less then or equal to zero then the bound's emtpy bit will be set to true. Subclasses must call the super.setBounds() method.
        Specified by:
        setBounds in interface WorldObject
        Overrides:
        setBounds in class WorldObjectImpl
        Returns:
        true if the bounds changed.
